pytket-pyzx¶

PyZX is an open-source Python library for automated rewriting and optimisation of quantum circuits using the ZX calculus.

pytket-pyzx is an extension to pytket that allows conversion to and from PyZX representations.

pytket-pyzx is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on Linux, MacOS and Windows. To install, run:

pip install pytket-pyzx

pytket.pyzx¶

Module for conversion between PyZX and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

pytket.pyzx.tk_to_pyzx(tkcircuit: pytket.circuit.Circuit) → pyzx.circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit to a pyzx.Circuit.

Return type

Circuit

Parameters

prog – A circuit to be converted

Returns

The converted circuit

pytket.pyzx.pyzx_to_tk(pyzx_circ: pyzx.circuit.Circuit) → pytket.circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a pyzx.Circuit to a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit . All PyZX basic gate operations are currently supported by pytket. Run pyzx_circuit_name.to_basic_gates() before conversion.

Return type

Circuit

Parameters

prog – A circuit to be converted

Returns

The converted circuit
